DOC.brief_summary: The objective present study assess document safety second dose Varicella Biken vaccine administer 4 6 year age healthy child previously receive first dose Varicella Biken vaccine . All subject receive second dose Varicella vaccine ( Varicella Biken ) 4 6 year age . The expected total duration follow-up ( first visit last visit ) subject one month .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Second Dose Biken 's Varicella Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Aged 4 6 year day inclusion . Informed consent form sign parent ( ) legal guardian independent witness . Subject parent/guardian able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure . Written documentation receipt first dose Varicella Biken vaccine 3 month inclusion . Participation another clinical trial investigate vaccine , drug , medical device , medical procedure 4 week precede trial vaccination . Planned participation another clinical trial present trial period . Known suspect congenital acquire immunodeficiency , immunosuppressive therapy anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 6 month , longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy . Known systemic hypersensitivity vaccine component history lifethreatening reaction trial vaccine vaccine contain substance . Chronic illness , stage could interfere trial conduct completion , opinion investigator . Receipt vaccine 4 week precede trial vaccination ; Planned receipt vaccine 4 week follow trial vaccination . Known Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C seropositivity . History varicella infection ( confirm either clinically , serologically microbiologically ) . Previous vaccination varicella disease vaccine different Varicella Biken vaccine . Febrile illness ( temperature ≥ 37.5°C ) moderate severe acute illness/infection day vaccination , accord investigator judgment .
